 46 -class Radio(Component): 

 47      """ 
 48      Base class for radios. 
 49      """ 
 50      __metaclass__ = ABCMeta 
 51   

 52 -    def __init__(self, platform): 

 53          Component.__init__(self, platform) 
 54          self._receiveHandler = None 

 55   

 56 -    def setReceiveHandler(self, receiveHandler): 

 57          """ 
 58          Set the packet handler function. 
 59   
 60          @param receiveHandler: Function to be called when a packet is 
 61              successfully received. The received L{RadioPacket} will be passed 
 62              as an argument. 
 63          """ 
 64          self._receiveHandler = receiveHandler 

 65   
 66      @abstractmethod 

 67 -    def handlePacket(self, packet): 

 68          """ 
 69          Simulate the result of an incoming packet from the radio channel. If 
 70          the packet is received, it should be passed to the receive handler. 
 71          """ 
 72          pass 

 73   
 74      @abstractmethod 

 75 -    def transmit(self, packet): 

 76          """ 
 77          Transmit a packet. 
 78   
 79          @param packet: L{RadioPacket} to send. 
 80          """ 
 81          pass 

 82   
 83      @property 

 84 -    def _env(self): 

 85          """ 
 86          Shortcut to access the L{RadioEnvironment} experienced by this radio. 
 87          """ 
 88          return self.platform.simulation.environment.radioEnvironment 

 89   

 90 -    def _simulationChange(self): 

 91          if self.platform.simulation is not None: 
 92              self._env.receivers.add(self) 

 93   

 94 -class IdealRadio(Radio): 

 95      """ 
 96      An ideal radio that can always receive and transmits instantaneously. 
 97      """ 

 98 -    def handlePacket(self, packet): 

 99          if self._receiveHandler is not None: 
100              self._receiveHandler(packet) 

101   

102 -    def transmit(self, packet): 

103          self._env.transmit(self, packet)
